mapper.select: SELECT tcu.*, content.CONTENT_COUNT AS SCORE FROM TOBE_CORE_USER tcu LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tcu.id, COUNT(1) as CONTENT_COUNT FROM TOBE_CORE_USER tcu JOIN TOBE_CONTENT_GENERAL_INFO tcgi ON tcu.ID = tcgi.OWNER_ID AND tcgi.DELETED = 0 AND tcgi.PUBLIC_TO_ALL = 1 WHERE tcgi.id is not null GROUP BY tcu.id) as content ON content.id = tcu.id ORDER BY SCORE DESC, tcu.CREATE_TIME DESC LIMIT 5
